Importing tidyverse
```{r include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

Creating a plot using starwars data
```{r, starwars-plot, warning=FALSE, fig.cap="ggplot test"}
starwars %>%
  filter(species == "Human") %>%
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = height,
      y = mass) +
  geom_point()
```

Creatin a table using starwars data
```{r, starwars-tbl}
starwars %>%
  filter(species=="Human") %>%
  select(name, height, mass, homeworld) %>%
  knitr::kable(caption="A knitr kable table of starwars data")
```
